DOC.brief_summary: Previous study report myoelectrical activity increase whole body vibration ( WBV ) . The investigator hypothesize change soleus muscle length affect whole body vibration induce soleus reflex muscle activity change ankle angle affect whole body induce soleus reflex muscle activity . The purpose study test hypothesis .
DOC.brief_title: Whole Body Vibration Induced Muscle Activity Effect Changes Length Soleus Muscle Angle Ankle
DOC.detailed_description: Eighteen healthy young adult men plan include study . Surface electrode place right soleus muscle 's belly . The electrode ( 10-mm diameter , inter-electrode distance 20 mm ) arrange direction muscle fiber . The skin overlie muscle shave , light abrasion apply , skin clean use 70 % alcohol . A piezo-electric accelerometer ( LIS344ALH full-scale Â±6 g linear accelerometer , ECOPACK ) place achilles tendon force sensor ( FC2331-0000-2000L Compression Load Sensor , France ) place right heel . All data record PowerLab ( data acquisition system , ADInstruments , Australia ) device . The data process offline computer . All surface electromyography ( SEMG ) analyse conduct use software ( LABCHART7 ver . 7.3.3 ; POWERLAB System , ADInstruments ) . All SEMG recording 80-500 Hz band-pass filter . Root-mean-square value ( RMS ) calculate filtered SEMG signal . WBV ( PowerPlate Pro5 ) high amplitude 35 Hz apply . Participants barefooted , sponge foam place vibration platform foot . Participants stand different position knee lock WBV . Their hip knees neutral position . Positions : Position-1 : Upright stand zero slop vibration platform Position-2 : Standing 10 degree ankle dorsiflexion zero slop vibration platform Position-3 : Standing 20 degree ankle plantarflexion zero slop vibration platform Position-4 : Upright stand twenty degree forward inclined vibration platform ( angle angle 20 degree ankle plantarflexion ) Position-5 : Leaning forward stand twenty degree forward inclined vibration platform ( angle angle neutral ) Position-6 : Upright stand 10 degree backward inclined vibration platform ( angle angle 20 degree ankle dorsiflexion ) Position-7 : Leaning backward stand 10 degree backward inclined vibration platform ( angle angle neutral ) Sequence position random . Maximal voluntary contraction ( MVC ) determine subject begin position use magnitude force heel vibration platform subject attempt activate soleus muscle maximally . Then vibration exposure 30 second . The participant instruct relax muscle throughout recording WBV train use electromyographic feedback end . WBV may impair sense balance muscle may activate restore balance . To overcome problem , participant familiarize WBV 15 trial session WBV device ask use handle device secure balance .
DOC.criteria: Healthy men Men age vary 20 40 year Righthanded men Bone , muscle/tendon , joint , vascular , dermatologic disease low extremity spine Medication could affect musculoskeletal system Postural abnormality ( scoliosis , kyphosis , etc ) Systemic disease ( Cardiopulmonary disease , diabetes mellitus etc ) Obesity ( BMI > 30 kg/m2 ) Vertigo / dizziness
